casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Chad Cameron COPLEY No. 195A19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 13, 2019 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, For Copley, Chad Cameron Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 23rd of May 2019 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of June 2019."
